remarks: Restricted specialization of operands, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2014.)
statement:
oveqrspc2v.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x F y ) = ( x G y ) ) $.
oveqrspc2v $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. A /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X F Y ) = ( X G Y ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y y $.
$d ph x y $.
